title: Stream: Deerhunter – Monomania
content:
Monomania, the latest Deerhunter album, is streaming over at NPR.

The follow-up to 2010’s Halycon Digest finds the group in a more confrontational mood, with the whole thing feeling looser and slightly less melodically inclined than their past few releases. Still, it’s a new Deerhunter album, which is always an exciting prospect and it’ll be interesting to see how Monomania, which, for all those who are curious, means a “pathological obsession with one idea or subject”, will hold up after a couple of listens.

The album is released on the 6th May by the lovely folks over at 4AD. You can hear Monomania via NPR First Listen here. Enjoy yourself kids!
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d11
